projects.name: Microservices with Docker
projects.description: Microservices application with Docker and Kubernetes in Java and Spring Boot.

projects.name: CRUD with Spring Security and swagger
projects.description: This project is a CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) application built with Spring Boot, implementing authentication and authorization using Spring Security. The API documentation was generated using the Swagger library.

projects.name: APIRest with MongoDB
projects.description: This project is a APIRest application built with Spring Boot, MongoDB, JPA, Hibernate, Lombok etc. The API documentation was generated using the Swagger library.
